Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_filter_attribute

The function AIL_filter_attribute retrieves the current value of the specified filter-level attribute.

void AIL_filter_attribute(
  HPROVIDER filter,
  char const * name,
  void *value
);

In Parameters

filter
specifies the filter to query.
name
specifies the name of the attribute to retrieve.

Out Parameters

value
specifies an address where the 32-bit value will be returned. The type of the returned attribute is specified by "type" field in the RIB_INTERFACE_ENTRY structure returned from AIL_enumerate_filter_attributes.

Discussion

Filter-level attributes are attributes that are read globally from a filter. For attributes that are specific to each sample (sample-level attributes), use the AIL_filter_sample_attribute function.

This function retrieves the current setting of an attribute. To change the setting, use the AIL_set_filter_preference function.

Example files that use this function: Filter.CPP
